question: Is it permitted to pronounce azaan in the masjid for jummah khutba or it should be given at the masjid doorstep.?
answer:
QUESTION

Is it permitted to pronounce azaan in the masjid for jummah khutba or it should be given at the masjid doorstep.

ANSWER


Share:

Assalāmu `alaikum Warahmatullāhi Wabrakatuh,

It is an established Sunnah to pronounce the Azaan of the Jumuah Khutbah in front of the Khateeb (one delivering the Khutbah - sermon). This has been the accepted practice since the inception of Islam till this day.[1]

(Hashiyatut Tahtawi Ala Maraqil Falah , Pg. 515, Qadeemi Kutub Khana; Imdadul Fattah Sharhu Nurul Iedaah wa Najatul Arwah Pg.564, Beirut)

 
 
And Allah Ta'āla Knows Best,
 
 
Checked and Approved by,
Muftī Ebrahim Desai

Darul Iftaa

 www.daruliftaa.net




[1] (والأذان بين يديه) جرى به التوارث , مراقي الفلاح , كتاب الصلوة , باب الجمعة , (ج 1 / ص 214)
